Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI answers are fixed, it doesn't point out the right mistake of mine while teacher of course would understand better and know where I need to improve

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher's feedbacks are more trustworthy and more relevant
